rows.title: Error: could not find function ... in R
My attempt at value initialization is interpreted as a function declaration, and why doesn't A a(()); solve it?
When should I use a return statement in ES6 arrow functions
Use dynamic variable names in JavaScript

580:
<p><a href="http://www.rdocumentation.org/advanced_search" rel="nofollow noreferrer">Rdocumentation.org</a> has a very handy search function that - among other things - lets you find functions - from all the packages on CRAN, as well as from packages from Bioconductor and GitHub.</p>

<p><a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/uGBQT.jpg" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/uGBQT.jpg" alt="enter image description here"></a></p>

<p>I got the same, error, I was running version .99xxx, I checked for updates from help menu and updated My RStudio to 1.0x, then the error did not come</p>

<p>So simple solution, just update your R Studio</p>
